page_content:
Review Level Setup

Version:MissionOS_2.0

You can create Review Levels (trigger levels) in MissionOS application using the Admin Setup menu.

You can perform the following steps to access the Review Level Setup page:

  1. Log into the MissionOS portal.
  2. Click open the Data Manager.

 

In Data Manager, navigate to Admin > Setup > Review Level Setup.

 

 

Follow the steps below to create review levels:

  1. The Regime Name appears disabled and preselected as AAA.
  2. Enter the Review Name as ‘Alert’.
  3. Enter the Review Abbreviation.
  4. Select the Color of choice.
  5. Enter the required values for the following:
  • Max Size factor
  • Min Size factor
  • Extra Size factor
  1. Click Create.
    The review level gets created and lists in the table below.

 

 

  1. Repeat the steps to create other Review Levels like ‘Action’ and ‘Alarm’.
  2. The created Review Levels appear in the Review Order field on the right-hand side.
  3. Click and drag to adjust the order as per requirement.
  4. Click Save.

Note:

  • You can search the table for a specific review level using the Search
  • You can edit and delete a review level detail, if required.

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to Create Review Levels, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To:  Create Review Levels in MissionOS
